links.*: Bored of the Rings: The Trilogy

wikitext.*:
'''Bored of the Rings''' is a satirical book by [[Harvard Lampoon]]. Since its publication, the title has been used for several other satires, mostly unrelated to the book.

*''[[Bored of the Rings (book)]]'', the original [[1969]] book.
*''[[Bored of the Rings (video game)]]'', a [[1985]] parody adventure game.
*''[[Bored of the Rings (comic)]]'', a three-issue storyline of MAD magazine, which satirizes ''The Lord of the Rings''.
*''[[Bored of the Rings: The Trilogy]]'', a [[2005]] spoof film.
*''[[Bored of the Rings (theatre)]]'', a [[2006]] cabaret show.
*''Bored of the Rings'', [[Tolkien's works in popular media#The Sarah Silverman Program|an episode of ''The Sarah Silverman Program]]''.
{{disambig}}
